function.description: Opposite of flightgears definition

function.name: aero/coefficient/CN
function.description: Normal force due to alpha, elevator and gear/flaps Increase in CN decreases Period and damping, Dutch Roll damping CN is low for landing

function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.description: Elevon left squared

function.description: Elevon right squared

function.description: Axial force due to flaps and gear

function.description: Canopy axial Coefficient

function.description: Canopy axial Coefficient for broken off

function.name: aero/coefficient/CA
function.description: Basic Tangential/axial Coefficient

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyb
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cybtank
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip due to drop tank Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/coefficient/CYb_M
function.description: Change_in_Side_force_due_to_beta_due_to_mach

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyzero
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to asymmetric detachment of fuselage vortices

function.name: aero/coefficient/CYdr
function.description: Side_force_due_to_rudder

function.name: aero/coefficient/CYDa
function.description: Side_force_due_to_aileron

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clb
function.description:
Roll damp due to sideslip
Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cltank
function.description: Roll damp due to drop tank

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clp
function.description:
Roll damp due to roll rate
Clp alone determines damping-in-roll characteristics

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clr
function.description:
Roll due to yaw rate
Considerable effect on Spiral mode. Large positive values leads to strong spiral instability.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clbdot
function.description: Roll due to sideslip rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clpylon
function.description: Roll due to missile asymmetric loaded under wings

function.name: aero/coefficient/Claileron
function.description: Roll due to aileron and elevator

function.name: aero/function/air-intake-factor-CA
function.description: Air intake factor

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm-due-to-CA
function.description: Pitch due to Air intake factor

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm-due-to-Zero-moment
function.description: Pitch due to Zero moment

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm-due-to-ground-effect
function.description: Pitch due to ground effect

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmelevator
function.description: Pitch moment due to elevator

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmq
function.description:
Pitch damping due to pitch rate
Pitch Damping Derivative Very important to Short Period damping of oscillations

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmadot
function.description:
Pitch damping due to alpha rate
Negitive Cmad increase Short Period damping

function.name: aero/function/CAMissile
function.description: Axial force of asymmetric pylon stores. Function is used to calculate yaw due to asymmetric stores under wings.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnb
function.description:
Yaw due to sideslip
Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnzero
function.description: Yaw due to asymmetric detachment of vortexes

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnp
function.description:
Yawing due to roll speed
Reduces Dutch Roll damping positive value desireable

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnr
function.description:
Yaw damping due to yaw rate
Main contributor to damping of Dutch Roll

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnbdot
function.description: Yaw due to sideslip rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cntank
function.description:
Yaw due drop tank
Data is from alpha=16 and gears and flaps deployed.

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnMissile
function.description: Yaw due asymmetric stores on wing pylons

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnaileron
function.description: yaw due to aileron and elevator

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnrudder
function.description: Yaw moment due to rudder
